edu.cmu.sphinx.fst

Class Convert

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.Convert

  • public class Convert
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the required functionality in order to convert from/to openfst's text format

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void export(Fst fst, java.lang.String basename)
      Exports an fst to the openfst text format Several files are created as follows: - basename.input.syms - basename.output.syms - basename.fst.txt See OpenFst Quick Tour
      static Fst importFst(java.lang.String basename, Semiring semiring)
      Imports an openfst text format Several files are imported as follows: - basename.input.syms - basename.output.syms - basename.fst.txt

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • export

        public static void export(Fst fst,
                          java.lang.String basename)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Exports an fst to the openfst text format Several files are created as follows: - basename.input.syms - basename.output.syms - basename.fst.txt See OpenFst Quick Tour
        Parameters:
        fst - the fst to export
        basename - the files' base name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO went wrong

      • importFst

        public static Fst importFst(java.lang.String basename,
                            Semiring semiring)
                     throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Imports an openfst text format Several files are imported as follows: - basename.input.syms - basename.output.syms - basename.fst.txt
        Parameters:
        basename - the files' base name
        semiring - the fst's semiring
        Returns:
        imported FST
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO went wrong
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - load failed due to data format issues
